tidbits.title: Remote Wilderness
tidbits.description: The territory comprises remote and pristine wilderness, including subantarctic islands and the Kerguelen Archipelago, largely uninhabited by humans.

tidbits.title: Scientific Research
tidbits.description: The lands serve as platforms for scientific research, studying climate change, biodiversity, and conducting important research in the Antarctic region.

tidbits.title: Protected Natural Reserves
tidbits.description: The area is home to several protected natural reserves, safeguarding unique ecosystems, wildlife, and fragile environments in the Southern Ocean.
